```scss
// Property: alertSetting
// Description: The current alert settings.
// Component(s): GetUserNotificationSettings
'.alert-setting-not-supported[platform=ios]': { alertSetting: Ti.App.iOS.USER_NOTIFICATION_SETTING_NOT_SUPPORTED }
'.alert-setting-enabled[platform=ios]': { alertSetting: Ti.App.iOS.USER_NOTIFICATION_SETTING_ENABLED }
'.alert-setting-disabled[platform=ios]': { alertSetting: Ti.App.iOS.USER_NOTIFICATION_SETTING_DISABLED }
```
